trends: There has been one other sighting in Streamwood
There were no other sightings in Streamwood on or around February 18th 2006
Summary: light moving in line, then zig zag motion before dissapearing
divs: Sighting DetailsOn my way to bowling saturday night with my boyfriend (I was in the passenger seat.) I happened to be looking through the upper right corner area of the windshield and I thought I saw a shooting star. "Oh :)...wait..." Not two seconds after it appeared, it started to zig zag (or spiral?) and popped out of sight. It was light white blue, very bright.
